snippet: The Mets are looking for help at catcher and still need to determine what they are going to do with R. A. Dickey, their Cy Young Award-winning knuckleballer.
abstract: New York Mets return to New York having made only two transactions at winter meetings in Nashville, TN; general manager Sandy Alderson admits that team has many holes to fill, but points to thin trade and free-agent market this year as primary cause.
lead_paragraph: The Mets are looking for help at catcher and still need to determine what they are going to do with R. A. Dickey, their Cy Young Award-winning knuckleballer.

headline.seo: Mets Have Plenty of Tasks on Their To-Do List
headline.main: Plenty of Tasks Remain on the Mets’ To-Do List
headline.print_headline: Plenty of Tasks Remain On the Mets’ To-Do List
